excerpt.rendered:
The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Saturday 

Cream Tomato Soup with Basil – vegan / paper bio container / 330 ml (tomato, basil, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Polenta with Tofu and Cashew Cream – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (tofu, polenta, cashews, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Cocoa and Mint Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, almonds, dates, cocoa butter, coconut, fresh mint, fresh cocoa powder, unfiltered honey)
